author.name: Sohel Dhengre
author.bio: I'm a Software Engineer with over six years of experience.

events.title: iOS Engineer
events.subtitle: Antino Labs
points: Fixed bugs and added new features inDRA and SIMN applications
Participated in Intel IoT Hackathon and built a smart soul with knock sensor, Edison board and BLE

events.title: iOS Developer Intern
events.subtitle: Orion Infosolutions
points: Took Stanford University's CS193p (Developing Applications for iOS)
Built TBNEurope application from scratch and published to AppStore
Built Montcalm application from scratch and published to AppStore
